data.content:
noun
[noncount] :a state in which the processes of the body (such as blood circulation) stop or become very slow for a period of time while a person or animal is unconscious
animals that sleep through the winter in a state of suspended animation - often used figuratively
The project has been in (a state of) suspended animation for over 15 years.

Danh từ
sự sống lay lắt (sống nhưng không cảm biết gì)
the whole project is in suspended animation while we wait for permission to proceed
toàn bộ đề án sống lay lắt chờ ngày thực hiện
